title: Neutral Manappuram Finance, target price Rs 110: Phillip Capital (India) - Economic Times
content: Neutral Manappuram Finance, target price Rs 110: Phillip Capital (India)  Economic Times
description: â€‹The brokerage believes that heightened competition in this space will continue to impact growth and compress spreads for gold finance NBFCs. Moreover, gold price remains the key factor in balance sheet growth in this business, hence the business model remains highly vulnerable to any sharp downward movement in gold prices.
